content: this legal case took place in tartu county court and involved two parties referred to as vk and jk vk filed a counterclaim against jk and the court decided to partially satisfy vks counterclaim as a result the joint assets between vk and jk including immovable property will be divided fairly a car belonging to jk and vk was sold at a public auction with the proceeds divided equally between them jk was also paid for the storage cost of the car the court dismissed jks claim for compensation from the defendants joint assets and the request to deduct expenses from the claimants account the case also involves a divorce with the claimant seeking the sale of the apartment and car at a public auction or sole ownership of the apartment and compensation from the defendant the court found that the apartment belongs to the joint assets and ordered its sale the court also ordered the sale of the car with a partial deduction of the deposit fee the claimant incurred additional costs for car storage which the court considered reasonable and necessary the court rejected the claimants request for reimbursement of utility costs from the defendants separate assets the claimant also sought reimbursement for personal expenses from the defendant but the court rejected this claim the court must determine if the expenses were incurred for joint or separate assets the supreme court made a decision regarding a case between a husband and wife where the husband demanded compensation for the use of a car and funds from a bank account the court rejected the claimants request for expenses from the joint assets due to lack of evidence the court also discussed the allocation of procedural costs which will be determined based on the specific circumstances of the case the claimant received state legal aid for their legal fees the court will now determine the amount of procedural costs each party will have to bear
